resources.string: Please fill in your information so that we can help you the best way we can.
Do you want select the number from your contacts?
Please confirm if your are okay.

FallWatch uses acceleration sensors to detect sudden changes in your movement. You can either use your devices internal sensor or a external MetaMotionC sensor when using FallWatch. When using external sensor, you do not have to have your device with you to use the application. However, we highly recommend to have you device always nearby. You can turn the detection on/off from the home view.\n\nIn case of possible collision, FallWatch will ask you if you are okay. To this question you can either answer yes or no. If your answer is yes, FallWatch will send a text message to your two defined contacts. From this message your contacts will know that you have possibly injured yourself and also your current location.
How can I change my settings?

From the left uppercorner of the application, you can find a navigation, which takes you the settings. From the settings you can choose to use internal/external sensor and change your user information. You can change your name that will be shown in the text message your contacts receives in case of collision. You can also change your contacts. Remember to press the "Apply" button to validate your latest settings.
Does the application have to be active in order it to work?
No. You can turn the application off once you have set the detection on. FallWatch will continue detecting in the background even if the app is not active.
Toggle to turn detection on and off.
